document_data.name: House of Comfort
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of Comfort''' was an [[inn]] located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The inn was located in south Zhentil Keep in the center of the [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]] along [[Zhent Avenue]].
document_data.Description: The House of Comfort had two storys and 28 rooms available to rent. The rooms were kept clean but tended to be a bit chilly.
document_data.Activities: Patrons were charged 5 [[gp]] per night and meals were an additional 2 [[sp]], a mug of ale was 3 sp, and a hot bath was 1 gp. The stables could be used for 2 gp.
document_data.Inhabitants: An unmarried woman named [[Maradad]] ran the House of Comfort. Her staff including a pair of servings girls named [[Anna (Zhentil Keep)|Anna]] and [[Lise]], and a young man named [[Anderis]] who took care of general chores.
